attributes.action: Open didcot police station and provide a minor injuries unit
attributes.additional_details:
Open the police station in didcot for safety after many sexual and physical assaults have taken place so that police aren't having to travel and we don’t have to wait so long for a response, needs to be an active policy station again 
A&E/minor injuries provides less stress for the ambulance services and individuals can then access health care out of hours for minor ailments. Not only this but with our growing care homes and community on a whole we need access for services in didcot
attributes.background: Open didcot police station we have grown have more crime and need an active police station as well as a open minor injuries for minor ailments

rejection.details:
This is an operational matter for the Thames Valley Police service, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could contact your local MP and ask them to speak to Thames Valley Police on your behalf. You can find your MP's contact details by entering your post code here: https://members.parliament.uk/members/commons.
